alert.note: Alert for Coastal Harris; Inland Harris (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 09 at 6:28PM CST by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN HARRIS COUNTY THROUGH 715 PM CST... At 627 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Harrisburg / Manchester, or near Galena Park, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Pasadena, Baytown, La Porte, Deer Park, South Houston, Galena Park, Jacinto City, Greater Eastwood, Cloverleaf, Channelview, Second Ward, Greater Fifth Ward, Highlands, Greater Third Ward, Greater Hobby Area, Macgregor, northeastern South Belt / Ellington, northern Clear Lake, Shoreacres, and Morgan`s Point. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
